name: Angular Silence (Pilhamre)
description:
The Atmospheric environment will take you far into the feel of controlling the game. This relaxing game is all about to change when you realize that it's all about the time, the time for you to get from the start all the way to the finish line.

Surrounded with bushes, trees and vines hanging down from the cliffside you'll get the opportunity to control the world around you with a single mouse click. This is also how you will continue the journey towards the next checkpoint.
